snippet: Once largely limited to the technology and sales sectors, the agreements are entering a range of fields; even camp counselors and hairstylists are being required to sign.
abstract: Noncompete clauses are now appearing in far-ranging fields beyond the worlds of technology, sales and corporations with tightly held secrets, where the curbs have traditionally been used; even camp counselors and hairstylists are increasingly required to sign agreements that prohibit them from working for a company's rivals.
lead_paragraph: Once largely limited to the technology and sales sectors, the agreements are entering a range of fields; even camp counselors and hairstylists are being required to sign.

headline.main: Noncompete Clauses Increasingly Pop Up in Array of Jobs
